body.p: An entity issues insurance contracts without direct participation features and aggregates those contracts into a group applying paragraphs C9(a) and C10. The entity estimates the fulfilment cash flows at the transition date applying paragraphs 33–37 as the sum of:

li.p: an estimate of the present value of the future cash flows of CU620 (including the effect of discounting of CU(150)); and
a risk adjustment for non-financial risk of CU100.
